website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive option that works well for word processing and web browsing.
pros: One of the most affordable 2-in-1 models available
A simple design that can handle video streaming and works great in tablet mode
Impressive 500GB hard drive for a low price
cons: There are many more powerful options available
Can be slow when multiple windows are open

customer_reviews.title: Compact but not cramped
customer_reviews.text: This is the only small laptop I could find with 1 TB hard drive memory and that wasn't over $500. It's the perfect, portable size that still lets me edit my photos. The start up is a bit sluggish, but the operation after that picks up speed. The power button on the side, near the front, is awkward; I have accidentally clicked the computer to sleep just by moving the machine.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I got this yesterday and it's working well for me so far. I do have a wish list of things I would like to redesign about it: - I wish it was a little faster - There are *NO* LED indicators. For example to indicate power or charging. Seriously. I've never seen a laptop that didn't have such indicators! - The power button is too easy to press by accident, especially when opening the display more than 180° Update: the speed is really an issue at times but maybe it's partly because it's loaded with Windoze. I have a Linux desktop at home but want to keep at least one Windows machine because of the driver/software for my printer.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Bruno

customer_reviews.title: SLOW, SLOW, SLOW
customer_reviews.text: This machine was returned. This processing speed was extremely slow. We tried resetting the machine a number of times and nothing we tried improved its processing speed. Finally, we gave up and returned it. Dell products usually work well but this one seemed to be the exception to the rule.
customer_reviews.author: RickWood5311

customer_reviews.title: great little laptop
customer_reviews.text: can be slow at times but my girls use them for school work and watching Netflix/YouTube and they work fine for that. They are exactly what we needed for my 10 and 11 year old. I did buy the 2 year protection plan. hoping we don't have to use it. They seem pretty durable. No issues so far
customer_reviews.author: boumel

customer_reviews.title: It's good for the price
customer_reviews.text: It lags a little but it's not a major issue. I love everything about it though. It's a simple laptop/tablet that can do everything a full size laptop can do (except play DVDs and CDs). This is lightweight so it's easy to carry around. That annoying power button though...I've accidentally put my computer to sleep on too many occasions.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Z.

customer_reviews.title: How Old is this product?
customer_reviews.text: Was not aware that this was a third party purchase. This was a 2018 product and the warranty was delayed. While I had few problems securing warranty assistance the questions surrounding this were disturbing! Since the service is on going I'm not sure how this plays out. Great machine, works well, but had problems w/reversing from touch screen to mouse manipulation. This necessitated a call for Dell assistance. Item is stuck in a mode I cannot repair........at one month old!
customer_reviews.author: Card Connector

customer_reviews.title: Nice neat package.
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of this laptop. Unfortunately, although the size is perfect, The performance is less than stellar. I had the 13in 7000 and after 2 months the unit stopped charging. I returned it to Sams and they credit me with no questions asked. By that time, the model was priced over $200 more. When I ordered the 11in 3000 series, the speed and performance were immediately noticeable. Unfortunately, I need the speed of the 7000 with the size of the 3000. I will keep this one for a few years and hope that the technology allows for my preference. Both units are great little portables.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A.

customer_reviews.title: Bought new from Amazon - already OUT OF WARRANTY!
customer_reviews.text: The product was fine, slow, but fine for my needs. However, it was received already ONE YEAR PAST WARRANTY!! Apparently Dell considers the warranty start from Amazon's receipt of the item I guess, because contacting Dell for a simple question revealed that, although I only had it for two weeks, it was already past warranty! Just keep this in mind.
customer_reviews.author: william balestrini

customer_reviews.title: Slower than Slow
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an upgrade fro my 7 year old Chromebook. This computer was actually a downgrade. Much slower than my old Chromebook and I mean agonizingly slow. I can't believe that Dell would release a product with such poor performance
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Thurston

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: Used laptop three times and the mouse stop working so I have to continually restart the laptop. Is this even a brand new one? I don’t advise anyone purchase this laptop it’s a hassle. Touch screen barely works. Got this for a job that I started need PowerPoint now I’m stuck looking for another one.
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: No longer a great purchase, less than year of ownership.
customer_reviews.text: I've been having issues for months with this laptop. When I first got it, it was OK. It hasn’t been a year and I have more problems with this laptop, then any laptop I have ever had. Shift key doesn't, I have to use the caps lock key to capitalize letters. WiFi keeps not working and have to look at videos to fix it. The entire keyboard stopped working and I'm using the online keyboard. ridiculous. My husband is going to get me a regular keyboard to use this laptop. I'm in the process of purchasing a regular desktop computer. This was my gift to myself, some gift.
customer_reviews.author: Dawnyell

customer_reviews.title: The laptop works great and i have no complaints.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this laptop instead of a Chromebook. I made the right choice. I do a lot of Word Perfect documents and the documents are compatible with my other computers. The tablet works great and I am completely satisfied. The small size makes it completely portable for the way I need to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Tucker

customer_reviews.title: The tablet pretty much just sucks..
customer_reviews.text: Terrible little tablet. Not worth the money. Tons of glitches in the system. Already falling apart. Buttons get stuck, super slow.
customer_reviews.author: Elvis girl

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I love it .It came really fast and was packages well. Its just what i wanted a laptop/tablet and it was a great price.So far it works really well .Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Markie

customer_reviews.title: Slow and Defective speakers.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this laptop because of the size and portability. It is slow and the speakers are defective with distorted speech, broken. I called Dell and was told that the warranty expired in September 2019 but I bought this laptop on Black Friday, November 2019. Still trying to get the speakers fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Onochie

customer_reviews.title: Too slow
customer_reviews.text: Battery goes fast Operates too slow and has crashed multiple times already.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Delivers as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect compact laptop for me, and it still has good storage capacity for photos and music. It's not going to have the processing power of a larger laptop, but as long as you know that going in, it gets the job done well.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Thompson

customer_reviews.title: so far so good....
customer_reviews.text: We give this product high marks for ease of set-up and are satisfied thus far with the speed of the processor, which was an area of slight concern when we purchased. Recommended for word processing, Internet browsing, etc
customer_reviews.author: JDM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: I like the colour, the convertability part and very user friendly
customer_reviews.author: Cosam M.

customer_reviews.title: Needed a computer at a decent price. but a little slow
customer_reviews.text: laptop for my daughter, she says its perfect except a little slow when working on programs loaded.
customer_reviews.author: Roxann Whited

customer_reviews.title: Over heats
customer_reviews.text: They laptop gets very hot fast, Not one of Dell's best products.
customer_reviews.author: Mary J Hudson

product_meta.title: Dell Inspiron 11.6 Laptop, Dell 11 3000 11.6" HD Touchscreen 2-in-1 Premium 2019, AMD A9-9420e, 4GB DDR4, 500GB HDD, HDMI BT 4.0 WiFi USB 3.1 HD Webcam MaxxAudio Win 10
product_meta.description:
This listing has upgraded configurations. If the computer has modifications (listed above), then the manufacturer box is opened for it to be tested and inspected and to install the upgrades to achieve the specifications as advertised. If no modifications are listed, the item is unopened and untested. Defects & blemishes are significantly reduced by our in depth inspection & testing.

PRODUCT OVERVIEW

Dell Inspiron 11 3000 11.6-inch 2-in-1 Touchscreen Laptop with CinemaStream and CinemaSound. Colorful, lightweight and impressively versatile with four modes to travel with you anywhere.

KEY SPECIFICATIONS: 

Series: Dell Inspiron 11.6 Laptop 

PC Type: 2 in 1 laptop 

Display: 11.6" HD (1366 x 768) Touch screen WLED Display 

Processor: AMD Dual-Core A9-9420e, 2.60GHz 

Memory: 4GB 2400MHz DDR4 SDRAM

HDD: 500GB HDD 

Operating system: Windows 10 Home 64-Bit 

Graphics: AMD Radeon R5 Graphics Integrated 

Keyboard: Standard Keyboard 

Bluetooth: Bluetooth 4.0 

Wireless Connectivity: 802.11bgn 

Audio: Wave MaxxAudio Pro 

Speaker: Stereo speakers 

Camera: Built-in 720p HD Webcam 

Media Card Reader: 3 in 1 Card Reader, Supports SD, SDHC and SDXC memory card 

Ports: 1 x HDMI, 1 x USB 3.1, 2 x USB 2.0, 1 x Media Card Reader, 1 x combo headphone / microphone Jack 

Battery: 2-cell Lithium ion 

Color: Gray 

Dimensions L x W x H: 8" x 11.5" x 0.8" 

Weight: 3.25lbs
